LanguageData.AF_Underpants_SG.label: Traditional Dress
LanguageData.AF_Underpants_SG.description: Woven from Gylanly fibres, this incredible material was not surpassed by synthetic materials until Ferian broke through the light barrier. \n\nIt's just an ordinary pair of pants. Although its history is extremely long, but it is still the forefront of fashion!
